ygData.subject: Re: Just wondering...
ygData.msgSnippet: According to Everlore.com, you are correct. those 2 do have the same stats. But the icetooth claw only weighs 2.0 while the Crystalized Sword weighs 4.0. Do
ygData.messageBody:
According to Everlore.com, you are correct. those 2 do have the same
stats. But the icetooth claw only weighs 2.0 while the Crystalized
Sword weighs 4.0.

Do you happen to have an Icetooth claw for sale?? :D


--- In EverQuest@y..., "The Mad Macinchaote" <scendera@v...> wrote:
> Doesn't it have the same stats as Icetooth's claws? might be able
to get those cheaper and they are light. Just /punt me if I'm
thinking about the wrong sword here but what I am thinking is a
11/29, don't remember weight.
